content:
Enable users to enter multiple lines of text by adding a Text Area element to your OmniScript. Limit the number of characters the user can enter.

Drag a Text Area element from the Build panel onto the canvas.
In the Properties panel, give the element a name in the Name field.
In Field Label, enter a label visible to the user.
(Optional) In Minimum Length, enter the minimum number of characters the user must enter.
(Optional) In Maximum Length, enter the maximum number of characters the user can enter.
(Optional) Use additional properties described in Common OmniScript Element Properties Definitions.

Text Area Properties are configurable from the Properties panel when you select a Text Area element. With the Text Area element, enable users to enter multiple lines of text in your OmniScript.
title: OmniScript Text Area Element
